title: In case of special buildings, the Completion Certificate shall also be accompanied with the NOC from Chief Fire Officer of respective Authority or Director of Fire services, as the case may be
clause_text: In case of special buildings, the Completion Certificate shall also be accompanied with the NOC from Chief Fire Officer of respective Authority or Director of Fire services, as the case may be.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
